title: ‘사람’과 함께하는 소프트웨어 개발자
subtitle: 맹목적인 기술의 발전이 아닌 ‘사람을 위한 기술’을 추구합니다. ‘커뮤니케이션’을 중요시합니다.

quote.content: It is the individual who is not interested in his fellow men who has the greatest difficulties in life and provides the greatest injury to others. It is from among such individuals that all human failures spring.
quote.author: Alfred Adler

quote.content: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quote.author: George Bernad Shaw
